attributes.additional_details:
Everyone is suffering. You don't seem to see it because you're not in touch with society. What you are doing is criminal. You are stealing from the poorest in society to fill this so called blackhole that nobody can prove exists ( apart from the money you gave to the Unions). 
You have changed things without even listening to the people who voted you in. 
You have gone back on the promises you made to get into power. This is not democracy
attributes.background:
Since being elected into government you have taken money from pensioners, to the point where people are freezing to death.
 Taken away any possibility of a poor family ever owning their own home by ripping the RTB scheme apart, so now only the better off can buy their council home.
Now disability

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
